document.full_text: a school board in clovis, new mexico, voted to ban all extra-curricular clubs from meeting during school hours after a gay-straight alliance applied to become a club.
document.title: new mexico school bans club meetings after gay club formed
lines_and_colors: a school board in clovis, new mexico, voted to ban all extra-curricular clubs from meeting during school hours after a gay-straight alliance applied to become a club.
